messages.title: Strong leadership for Britain
messages.content: Strong leadership for Britain's security. Back Theresa as Prime Minister.

messages.title: YOUR LOCAL VOTE WILL DECIDE
messages.content: Higher taxes, fewer jobs, more debt. Labour's plan - bad for your economy. YOUR LOCAL VOTE WILL DECIDE.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working locally to keep our economy strong.

mentions.tacticalSituation: 11 days to go. Every vote counts. In a hung parliament, Jeremy Corbyn may lose the ability to choose and Theresa May needs just 6 seats to lose majority.

issues.economy: Back locally to keep our economy strong.

images.caption: Image of Theresa May with messages emphasizing economy and leadership for Britain's security.
